featured.text: Though not a national holiday, Obon is surely one of the most traditional events of the year.

definition.zh_def: 傳統的，指長期以來流傳下來的習俗、信仰或做法。
definition.en_def: Relating to customs, beliefs, or practices that have been handed down from generation to generation.
definition.example: The festival is a traditional celebration that has been observed for over a century.
